articles.title: Listen to Unreleased Prince Song “Born 2 Die” - Pitchfork
articles.description: Prince takes a Curtis Mayfield turn in the latest track from unvaulted LP Welcome 2 America
articles.content: Born 2 Die, a previously unreleased Prince song, is out now. The track was recorded as a rebuke to Dr. Cornel West, who said Prince was no Curtis Mayfield, according to Princes musical director Morri… [+784 chars]

articles.author: Ollie Neas
articles.title: How NZ’s new deal with Nasa could pave the way for moon mining - The Spinoff
articles.description:
The American-led Artemis Accords, signed this week by New Zealand, make a lot of the right noises. But they could lead to a more privatised, US-dominated future of space exploitation – and lunar mining. That’s a problem, writes Ollie Neas.

articles.title: Biden unveils effort to get more Americans vaccinated by July 4 - Aljazeera.com
articles.description: US President Joe Biden wants to get 70 percent of Americans vaccinated against COVID-19 for ‘summer of freedom’.
articles.content:
United States President Joe Biden has announced a month-long effort aimed at getting 70 percent of Americans vaccinated by July 4, the nations Independence Day.
